website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight cream is great for oily, acne-prone, and combination skin, leaving it soft and supple, but never greasy.

customer_reviews.text: I love snail creams. I bought this one because it was much more affordable than other ones out there, but it works just the same. I have redness around my nose and chin, and I don't like to wear makeup most of the time. This helped so much with reducing the redness around my trouble areas. I've been using it for more than a year now, and I feel confident walking outside with a clean face. This cream has made my skin smooth, helped reduce some wrinkling around my mouth and forehead. I have normal skin--not oily or dry. So it is a great product for me, but would recommend anyone to try it out if they are curious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the way it feels not really any improvement
customer_reviews.text: The nice thing about this moisturizer is it didn’t leave my skin is super oily and I struggled with acne really skin. But I don’t feel like it actually helped with curing my acne and I didn’t see a lot of improvement but I’m sure for someone else it probably would do more. The nice thing about this moisturizer is it didn’t leave my skin super oily and I struggle with acne skin. But I don’t feel like it actually helped with curing my acne and I didn’t see a lot of improvement but I’m sure for someone else it probably would do more
customer_reviews.author: Ally Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good but didn't work great for me.
customer_reviews.text: It was nice and it helps calm down redness, but it did not really work for me. I did not see much of a difference, but my sister loves it and it works amazing for her. I have pretty naturally clear skin and only break out on periods. She has acne prone skin and is constantly breaking out. It calms her skin and helps her scares disappear. But did not have much affect when I broke out and did not help my scars.
customer_reviews.author: hayley

customer_reviews.title: I love this snail cream! 🐌
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin. It has taken me years to find products that are suitable for my skin so I can form a proper skin care routine. While it has been a lengthy process, I have come to find amazing products such as this one. This product lasts a long time even with morning/night use and it wears well under makeup! I’ve only been using this product for two weeks but I already notice an improvement in my skin’s texture and complexion. My skin really loves this cream!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey DeCarlo

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Cream
customer_reviews.text: Bought on a whim, needed a new moisturizer. I have oily skin, I don't usually wear any makeup, just moisturizer and sunscreen, and I'm usually pretty shiny by 2pm or so. Using this product, my skin stays matte all the way through to the next morning. No joke. Feels a teensy bit drying and tight at first but that went away after 15 mins or so, and only happens when I apply too much. I don't have acne scars, so I cannot speak to that, but I do have larger pores and this product shrunk em right down. No smell whatsoever was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Snail mucus for an extra boost of moisture
customer_reviews.text: I like to double dose on my skin’s moisture, so I use this right after an ampoule and before my final face cream to seal everything in. If your skin is oily, you’ll be fine with just this repair cream. My skin is definitely softer in the morning when I add this to my routine at night. I really think snail mucus is great for hydrating and clearing up your skin, so you’ll like this if you’re obsessed with snail skincare.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye fine lines!
customer_reviews.text: I legit stopped getting Botox because this works so well. I use to have wrinkles even when my face was relaxed. Been getting small doses of Botox for the past two years to help with this. After using this product for a month now, the wrinkles are gone when my face is relaxed. Results are almost as good as Botox but better, because I can move my face and show emotion! Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: MitchMillett

customer_reviews.title: this is a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this. I think it does make my face soft (and not just for one hour, it stays soft all night through the morning). I'm def not WOWED by this product but for the price, if you just want to try the snail slime thing, this is a pretty good product. It'll last a long time. you dont need very much to cover your whole face. There is little to no smell. texture is light, goes on smoothly and feel cool. Overall I'd give it a 7/10 for a cheap face lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Madisyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this snail repair cream for use as a daily moisturizer every morning. I've gotten my mom and sister (who are usually expensive product junkies for brands like Drunk Elephant) and they both love it, too! It's lightweight, odorless, and has never given my oily, sensitive skin any issues. My skin looks and feels more hydrated after using this regularly. My only advice is to give it a bit of extra time to settle in to your skin before applying any makeup.
customer_reviews.author: LadyA87

customer_reviews.title: fine product
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it just didn't work for my skin but I didn't notice any difference in my skin or scarring, etc. It is moisturizing though!
customer_reviews.author: Alana Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for skin repair, fading dark spots, helps redness. I don’t think it helps with acne like a lot of people say it does, bc I still get acne but has still improved the overall look of my skin after using it for about 2 months, I feel Okay leaving the house without make up now sometimes. Not meant as moisturizer, but is light and you can just wear your usual face moisturizer over it once it dries.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes and Softens Skin
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this cream is amazing! It really softens my face and helps my acne scars. It tightens my face a bit too! After just one use you will see your skin glowing in the morning and how unbelievably soft it is!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: It has helped clear up my skin
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try this again after using it years ago with little improvement, but I was desperate. Some damage from another skincare product caused some really bad cystic acne, my skin was dry, and I had never had such bad skin. So, I ordered this, and I’ve been pleasantly surprised with the results. My skin is healing, I’m not getting nearly as many breakouts (and no cystic acne), and my skin is softer than it was. I am, however, disappointed that it hasn’t really moisturized my skin to the extent that I thought it would. My skin is still pretty dry. Overall, though, I’m pleased with the results, and I will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin W

customer_reviews.title: Works for some, but made me break out.
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry, sensitive, acne prone skin. While this provided some moisture, it was quite sticky, and made my face erupt in breakouts. I'm used to having an episode where there are a few in different sections of my face, but this was beyond that. I'm not sure if I had a reaction or what happened, but I got pretty gnarly cystic acne across my nose, chin, and forehead for days after using this product. I've heard and seen videos where people did like it, but like with trying any product, proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenna

customer_reviews.title: Good product but research it first.
customer_reviews.text: Do not use a basic soap and water skin routeine and try this product. You have to commit to a skincare routine where this product can work in harmony. when i began, i got random pimples. they would go away with a little crushed mint or soap and water depending on your patience, but they were extremely annoying and ugly sometimes too. i took two weeks off to do some research and start another routeine and then i brought it back and it does the trick. no breakouts yet. get a good toner. i use organic rose water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer. Completely absorbs and leaves no shine. I'm amazed that this jar has lasted 90 days. It's worth 10 times the price. Really has improved my skin's texture and hydration. Retin-A tends to dry my skin overnight, but using this during the day is the biggest help when combined with a peptide serum.
customer_reviews.author: Jlwleighton

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cream. I used it on my face when I had oily skin due to my pregnancy. The cream isn't slimey at all like some snail products can be. The cream is soothing, cooling, and thin enough to layer products underneath and over it. I also have atopical dermatitis (eczema) which flares up when I am stressed and this cream did not irritate my condition or skin. If you have dry skin, however, you may need a more moisturizing or heavier cream than this.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer. I have had oily skin all my life and never believe that moisturizing would actually solve that problem. This cream has changed my skin for the better. It is clear, balanced, and really soft...my neck also. This my third jar and I intend to continue using this for a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, not for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this snail cream is wonderful for most people, unfortunately my skin reacted with raised bumps. I was hoping that it wasn’t the cream, but the bumps went away when I stopped using it. So I can’t use it. At least I bought the small tube knowing that my skin was sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not A Moistrizer, More Of A Water Gel
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about this product. It's definitely not a moistrizer, extremely light and drippy. Takes awhile for it to absorb. I would identify this as more of a water gel. It has no scent and didn't really do much for me. I also don't like that its formulated with vegetable oil.
customer_reviews.author: Julien

customer_reviews.title: My new ride or die
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer. It’s perfect for what I want it to do. It moisturizers my skin and it doesn’t leave me looking oily. It has a nice matte finish. And it doesn’t clog my pores. I’ll probably have to switch to something slightly more heavy-duty for the winter, but this one is PERFECT for spring/summer/fall weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jackalope

customer_reviews.title: It does what they say, and feels so good doing it
customer_reviews.text: Apply in the morning or at night. Takes away the puffy feeling and kind of has that hyaluronic acid feeling where it tightens and soothes. Doesn't leave oily residue, and does remove deep definition of face and wrinkles. I really liked it, and you only need a little dab for each eye and cheek. Works like a charm. If you're considering it, just read the reviews. It's legit.
customer_reviews.author: Reckon Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Fave product on my skin care right now
customer_reviews.text: I swear this product is made of unicorn magic and pixie dust! Just kidding. It's one of my most favorite product on my skin care right now. I love how it feels on my skin. It's cooling, and when it dries up it just feels so airy. I actually feel my face being moisturized but not clogged, and it's not greasy at all. I also notice my open pimples get healed faster when I started using it. I'm currently on my second bottle now, and will continue on purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: paola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fixing my face
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product. I use this in the evening and in the morning every day. I have noticed a significant improvement in my skin quality. My coloring it to the point where 95% of the time I don't wear face makeup and my acne has totally cleared up. I had a minor breakup when I first started using this line but that's pretty normal when you switch products. It was gone in about a week and I've had great skin ever since. My eye wrinkles are fading as are my under eye circles.
customer_reviews.author: SVandy

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal as a final cream for very dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very, very dry skin, and this did not work for me. This my last skin care step, after double cleanse, toner/essence, eye cream and serum, and within 20-30 minutes my skin feels dry and tight again. (Not like the product is irritating it, more like I can tell that the moisture just isn’t being locked in.) I’ll probably switch back to my old cream and continue to use this after serum and treat this like an oil or an ampule; no point in wasting such a high concentration of active ingredients since I’m sure it can only help.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Can't understand the hype
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after first seeing it on a "20 holy grail Amazon items" list online, and after reading many of the reviews. I just don't understand what is so special about this cream. It feel nice and moisturizing when first applied, but it sinks in almost immediately and actually winds up feeling very dry writhin a minute. I can't use this as a single source moisturizer, I have to layer it or my skin feels parched. Regardless, I'm still using it twice per day and am not experiencing any benefit at all. My $7 tub of St Ives Renewing moisturizer is 100x better.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Mizon Snail products Rock!
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but the Mizon Black Snail 🐌 works much better for me. I just statrted with Mizon's Snail products in September 2016, like what I've tried very much. Good products.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel Flower Girl

customer_reviews.title: Will be your new favorite cream!
customer_reviews.text: My number one face cream I use under any other cream or serum. If I feel a pimple coming I can use this and it's gone the next morning. I have extremely sensitive skin and I cannot tell you how much this has helped smooth out my skin, reduce redness and make me feel overall more confident.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: No scent and for sensitive skin! It really works well!
customer_reviews.text: No scent, I love this because I have a skin reactions due to Neutrogena products that I had used for one week because I was trying some products that could be more suitable on my skin. By the way, I have very sensitive skin, and I found this all along. I give a try. Then, one application— my skin stop having red and peeling (like skin) Now, this is my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Catslover

customer_reviews.title: Turned moldy
customer_reviews.text: I was only about 30 days into using this product and noticed there was mold growing on the inside of the jar. It was not easy to see due the dark color of the jar itself. I realized it when the mold spores started appearing on the inside lid. I was totally grossed out and threw it away when I should have taken pictures to show.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so perhaps I was clueless when I purchased this but I was under the impression that this product was a bit heavier than it turned out to be. I have very very dry skin and though it helped a lot with the acne issues, it left my skin under nourished and dry. Please know that this product is not for dry skin as it is too light. But if you have oily or normal skin, this should be right up your alley!
customer_reviews.author: KPopPanda

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great product if I didn’t have an allergic reaction. I’m still giving a 5 star because my face was feeling very soft, however, my mouth and tongue felt numb and tingling after using this product. I am very careful about putting products around my mouth so I know I didn’t get any inside my mouth. Bummer! I was super excited about using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Not a Bad Product, Just Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: While this worked great for my friend (cleared up dark spots she said), the cream did cause me to immediately break out overnight. My friend is Latina, and I am African-American. I would recommend trying this on a small part of your face, maybe the T-zone or wherever you are most acne prone. :(
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this cream not expecting much of a miracle. I have been struggling with highpigmentation and acne scarring for a long time. I saw this product on Pinterest and decided why not? Honestly it's working like a champ. It takes time but it works wonders. My skin is soft, glowing and most of all it's correcting my skin tone. I don't even wear make up anymore because I want to get the full benefits of it. Definitely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Abibatu Konneh

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s nice light hydration for my oily, acne-prone adult skin. It’s my only moisturizer in the morning, except on some very cold days, and I layer it with a thicker moisturizer at night to keep all that snail goo in. While I also use some other acne treatments, this is great to keep away those pesky bumps and to help heal them. I’m on my second jar and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Farmer & Wife

customer_reviews.title: I am hooked!
customer_reviews.text: I had not tried the snail creams and was not sure what to expect so I got an inexpensive one for use all over the face and it really is a wonder cream. I use it for my face and neck and got an eye cream from the same brand. I am hooked! Better pricing and does not feel tight - like 90 second eye and 5 minute facelift - cheaper but gives the same great lifting results. Not gumjy at all. Would not know it was snail cream.
customer_reviews.author: DenverMom46

customer_reviews.title: Have used this for years and will continue.
customer_reviews.text: I can feel the moisture hours later, usually put it on at night.... meanwhile it's really light and dries fast. I feel like it has helped the appearance of my acne scars. It's the only face cream I really use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is very good cream, just when you find out what to use it for. I don’t know what develops mean by naming it all in one. When I try to use it as moisturizer it just dried my skin. I wanted to send it back, but suddenly I found out it fade away some irritation on my face and also I can use it as pore minimizer for my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Tati S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice on All Fronts
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for repairing damaged skin and giving it just that little bit of extra soothing hydration it needs to help itself. The formula is lightweight and absorbs quickly leaving a smooth, slightly tacky finish that isn't the best under makeup but works alright. The tube dispenses easily. There is no unpleasant scent as I have experienced with some other snail mucin products. All around, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t feel like the original Mizon product I purchased a few years ago. This has done nothing beneficial for my skin. If anything, my skin feels more dried out during the day. What a total waste of money. You’re better off buying a moisturizer at a local pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing more than okay. It's kind of thin and had a completely different texture from other products I've used with the same advertised ingredient which makes me question just how much snail mucin is actually in each bottle. It's okay but nothing special. I didn't notice any difference in my skin after using the whole bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: So I use this about 2-3 times a week after a shower, it’s the 4th step for me. After I put on my dermatologists recommended lotion(CeraVe). I’ve used it for about a year and had no problems! It makes my skin soft, and it holds in the moisture pretty well, like a shield. There’s not a smell which is great. I’m actually reviewing because I’m about to buy my second one (yes, it lasts that long! You only need just a little bit to cover the face, it spreads smoothly and evenly).
customer_reviews.author: Nikki May Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Overestimated
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay moisturizer but I really believe the reviews are overestimating the product. It hasn't worked any miracles on my face, not that I have acne or heavy skin concerns but my face looks and feels the same after a month. Changed my nightly skin care routine to your good skin products and that really is a great line and I've found positive changes in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Eldunari

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So moisturizing!! I have sensitive skin & it never irritated me at all. The smell isn’t bad, it’s just meh. That doesn’t take away from how much I love this face moisturizer!! I would recommend this 100%!
customer_reviews.author: LindsB
